definitions: characterized by gradual growth or increase

examples.text: despite the accretive sediment measured, there is a clear shoreline erosion
we expect the acquisition to be highly accretive

definitions: characterized by the coming together and cohesion of matter under the influence of gravitation to form larger bodies

examples.text: the presence of a magnetic field has a significant effect on the accretive behavior of a plasma

shortDefinitions: characterized by coming together of matter under influence of gravitation
